formalpara.title: Interner Hilfetext zu diesem AMI-Befehl in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen: Action: Getvar Synopsis: Gets a Channel Variable Privilege: call,all Description: Get the value of a global or local channel variable. Variables: (Names marked with * are required) Channel: Channel to read variable from *Variable: Variable name ActionID: Optional Action id for message matching.

formalpara.title: Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.2 zu 1.4:
Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.4 zu 1.6:

para.screen: --- in Asterisk 1.4 +++ in Asterisk 1.6 @@ -1,6 +1,6 @@ Action: Getvar Synopsis: Gets a Channel Variable - Privilege: call,all + Privilege: call,reporting,all Description: Get the value of a global or local channel variable. Variables: (Names marked with * are required) Channel: Channel to read variable from
